history.proof: intros A B f b xs H. induction xs. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - simpl. hauto q: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros A B f b xs H.
intros A B f b xs H.
intros A B f b xs H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A B f b xs H.
intros A B f b xs H.

original: intros A B f b xs H. induction xs. - simpl. intros H'. inversion H'. - simpl. intros H'. apply in_inv in H'. destruct H' as [H'' | H']. + exists a. split. rewrite H''. reflexivity. left. reflexivity. + apply IHxs in H'. destruct H' as [a' [H1 H2]]. exists a'. split. auto. right. auto.
